select fid, fname, to_char(start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, floc, genre, src from festival where fid =#{fid}
select aid, aname, src from artist where aid in (select aid from festival JOIN relation on festival.fid = relation.fid where relation.fid=#{fid})
